Birchwood electronics carrying case

13” x 10.5” carry case for transporting electronic componenst. Dividers were custom-designed to hold an extended Arduino kit, including: multiple breadboards, wires, motors, battery packs, analog sensors, and resistors. Exterior is constructed of 1/4” birch plywood, interior diviers of 1/8” birch plywood.

Client

Academic project

Duration

1 week

Team

Conner Hunihan

Personal Skills

Laser Cutting
3D Modeling
